config.googlyeyes.prop.acidTripEyes.name: Acid Trip Eyes
config.googlyeyes.prop.disabledGoogly.co:
To disable Googly Eyes on a specific entity, put their registry name in here.
EG: "Pig", "Skeleton"
For Players, put "player"
config.googlyeyes.prop.acidTripEyes.comm: Let them googly eyes be trippin'
config.googlyeyes.prop.allPlayersHaveGoo: Should all players have googly eyes?
